A potential buyer has inquired about an artwork‚Äîhow exciting! Let‚Äôs go through the steps to turn this inquiry into a sale.

li.p: Open the CRM App, where you will find the new opportunity in the "New" stage.
Click on the opportunity to open its details.
Use the "Send Message" button in the chatter to communicate with the client and gather necessary details.
Once the customer expresses interest, click "New Quotation" to generate a price proposal.

template.p: Once the customer confirms, you can send the Sales Order‚Äîcongratulations on selling an artwork! For more details, check the official documentation on sending and creating quotations.
Once you acquire a new piece of art, adding it to your collection ensures proper inventory tracking and availability online.

li.p: Create a Product:
Open the Inventory App and go to "Products" > "New".
Enter the artwork‚Äôs name, description and relevant attributes such as the artist or era.
If it's a unique piece, set the quantity to 1.
For multiple prints in a series, set the correct quantity.
Add Images & Categorization:
Upload high-quality images of the artwork.
Assign the correct Product Category (e.g., Paintings, Sculptures, Prints).
Set an eCommerce Category if you want it to be available for sale online.
Manage Online Visibility:
If you want the piece available for online purchase, check "Available in eCommerce".
Set pricing and any applicable shipping details.
Publish the Artwork:
Click the "Go to Website" button to preview the product page.
Once satisfied, switch the "Published" toggle to make it live.

template.p: Acquiring new pieces for your gallery is seamless with CRM and the Purchase App.

li.p: Track New Artwork Opportunities:
Open the CRM App and create a new opportunity for the artist or supplier.
Enter details about the artwork, including style, artist, and potential pricing.
Use the chatter to discuss pricing, terms, and availability with the seller.
Create a Purchase Order:
Once the artwork is confirmed, open the Purchase App.
Click "New Purchase Order" and select the vendor (artist or supplier).
Add the artwork as a product, specifying quantity, price, and expected delivery date.
Confirm the purchase order and send it to the vendor.
Receive the Artwork:
When the artwork arrives, go to the Purchase App and mark the order as received.
Update the inventory by adding the new piece to your catalogue.
Accounting & Payments:
Generate a vendor bill in the Accounting App.
Process payments according to agreed terms.
Keep track of expenses and ensure proper financial reporting.

template.p: Managing consigned artworks efficiently ensures accurate sales tracking and commission payments.
